headline: RLI's Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates on Strong Net Investment Income
summary: RLI's quarterly results reflect higher premium earned and improved investment income, offset by escalating expenses and poor underwriting income.

raw.headline: RLI's Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates on Strong Net Investment Income

headline: W. R. Berkley net income jumps 8% to $401.28m in Q2
summary: For the quarter ending 30 June 2025, the company's net premiums written amounted to $3.35bn (£2.48bn), reflecting growth of 7.2%.

raw.headline: W. R. Berkley net income jumps 8% to $401.28m in Q2

headline: W.R. Berkley Q2 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: WRB tops Q2 estimates with stronger underwriting and investment gains, despite elevated catastrophe losses.

headline: WR Berkley Corp (WRB) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Premiums and Investment Income ...
summary: WR Berkley Corp (WRB) reports strong financial performance with record net premiums and investment income, despite challenges from catastrophe losses and competitive pressures.
